analysis.description:
Drainable.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/20/0xeaf503fd64d0cf9278f29775b78c6f31001ffebc.sol#75-83) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,bal) (/unique_chucks/20/0xeaf503fd64d0cf9278f29775b78c6f31001ffebc.sol#82-83)
